articles.author: SETH BORENSTEIN AP Science Writer
articles.title: Shrinking giants: North Atlantic right whales getting tinier
articles.description: A new study says the hulking giants of the deep, North Atlantic right whales, are on average about three feet shorter than just 20 years ago
articles.content:
One of the giants of the deep is shrinking before our eyes, a new study says.
The younger generation of critically endangered North Atlantic right whales are on average about three feet (one meter) … [+3845 chars]
